meta.content: blueimp Gallery is a touch-enabled, responsive and customizable image & video gallery, carousel and lightbox, optimized for both mobile and desktop web browsers. It features swipe, mouse and keybo
meta.name: twitter:description

meta.content: blueimp Gallery is a touch-enabled, responsive and customizable image & video gallery, carousel and lightbox, optimized for both mobile and desktop web browsers. It features swipe, mouse and keyboard navigation, transition effects, slideshow functionality, fullscreen support and on-demand content loading and can be extended to display additional content types.

meta.name: description
meta.content: blueimp Gallery is a touch-enabled, responsive and customizable image & video gallery, carousel and lightbox, optimized for both mobile and desktop web browsers. It features swipe, mouse and keyboard navigation, transition effects, slideshow functionality, fullscreen support and on-demand content loading and can be extended to display additional content types.

a.class: minibutton with-count js-toggler-target star-button tooltipped tooltipped-n
a.aria-label: You must be signed in to star a repository

a.class: minibutton with-count js-toggler-target fork-button tooltipped tooltipped-n
a.aria-label: You must be signed in to fork a repository

div.class: sunken-menu vertical-right repo-nav js-repo-nav js-repository-container-pjax js-octicon-loaders

div.p: You can clone with HTTPS or Subversion.

a.title: Save blueimp/Gallery to your computer and use it in GitHub Desktop.
a.aria-label: Save blueimp/Gallery to your computer and use it in GitHub Desktop.
Download blueimp/Gallery as a zip file
a.title: Download blueimp/Gallery as a zip file

Refactored last merge.
Renamed interval and speed options to more semantic names. Added visual control to toggle the slideshow. Added SVG icons.
